abstract: Set up your PIR payload for call blocking and identity information.
overview:
## Overview

With Live Caller ID Lookup, when a device receives an incoming call, the system reaches out to a third-party service to fetch private information retrieval (PIR) data from your server. You need to format that data so the system can make the following requests:

For more information, see the [https://github.com/apple/swift-homomorphic-encryption].

### Block a caller

The blocking information request is a single byte with two defined values:

### Identify caller information

The identity request displays caller information on the device. This information is a serialized protocol buffer message of type `CallIdentity`. The following example shows the response formatting for an identity request:

items.description: Use Live Caller ID Lookup to protect user privacy by hiding the client’s IP address, using anonymous authentication, and hiding the incoming phone number.
items.name: Understanding how Live Caller ID Lookup preserves privacy

items.description: Connect the on-device system to your server.
items.name: Setting up the HTTP endpoints for Live Caller ID Lookup

items.description: Implement the Live Caller ID Lookup app extension to provide call-blocking and identity services.
items.name: Getting up-to-date calling and blocking information for your app

items.description: Information the system uses to query the app extension for context.
items.name: LiveCallerIDLookupProtocol

items.description: An object that allows the system to query the app extension.
items.name: LiveCallerIDLookupExtensionConfiguration

items.description: The information the system uses for configuration.
items.name: LiveCallerIDLookupExtensionContext

items.description: Returns a value with the current state of the app extension.
items.name: CallLookupExtensionStatus

items.description: The entry point that provides access to a collection of functions that help manage the state of the Live Caller ID Lookup app extension.
items.name: LiveCallerIDLookupManager

title: Formatting data for blocking and identity information
